overview: At the age of 80, Captain Meirson embarks on his last sail at open seas on his hand-made boat.  Surrounded by the breaking waves and sounds of depths, he refuses to accept what is more frightening than the winds - growing old.  - CODA FOR A CAPTAIN is a poetic interpretation of “The old man and the sea” - a cinematic journey of loneliness and senescence.
title: Coda For a Captain
